DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the liquid suspension form of AZD 2624 to a tablet form of the same drug. This study will also study the effect of food on the tablet form of the drug.
DOC.brief_title: Phase I 2-Way Crossover Study to Assess Relative BA of Tablet Versus Liquid Suspension and Food Effect on Tablet Formulation
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and female volunteers Donation of plasma or blood products within one month of of screening Clinically relevant abnormalities in physical examination, vital signs,ECG, clinical chemistry, hematology, or urinalysis. Previous participation in an AD2624 study.
